resources.string: Enable two button or three button navigation to use this feature
Press on color below to apply
Choose the default behavior when connected to a device via USB
Customize the layout of the navigation bar
Display left and right cursor buttons in navigation bar while typing
These settings mainly relate to the 3-button navigation bar. If you use gesture navigation and want to customize it, e.g. hide the gesture handle, please visit: Settings > System > Gestures.
Choose which system navigation style to use
Feel free to drop by our website

Evolution X is a custom ROM that aims to bring a Pixel feel to your device at first glance. With additional configurations at your disposal, we provide builds with monthly security patches from the latest Android sources.
Enable or disable battery light while on DND, low battery
Battery light in Do Not Disturb mode
Shows an animation while reading your finger

Disable heads up from these applications

Use old style mobile data icons
Show mobile type icon on top of the signal indicator
Activate the torch by long pressing the power button while the display is off
Enable for vertical layout. Default is horizontal
Show toggle for adaptive brightness near the slider
Pressing the volume keys will wake your device
Hides the global actions menu on secure lock screen
Enable the tile edit icon in the footer
Pulldown status bar from right side
Pulldown status bar from left side
Always show quick settings on status bar pull down
From headset if connected and playing music

Number of seconds to wait before hiding clock
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy

Display date in quick status bar header

Hides QS if device is locked. Does not disable notification shade

Show heads up only for dialer, messaging and alarm app
Show a kill app button in the notification\'s long press menu
Display and customize battery bar near status bar
Blend full/empty colors corresponding to battery percentage
Full → empty: red ← green ← blue ← red
Full → empty: red → green → blue → red
Scrolling cache may improve scrolling performance at the cost of memory

For better visibility on bright images
Display status bar on the lock screen
Display media cover art when available
Block access to certain sensors for some apps to save battery
Significant motion, accelerometer, linear acceleration sensors will be blocked for these apps
Turns on from sunset till a time
Turns on from a time till sunrise
Show the extra row of info under the lock screen clock (SysUI restart may be required)
Use the device hardware keys for navigation

Wake device by pressing the button
A half press will keep the screen on only while the button is held down
A longpress and release will launch camera
Swap volume buttons when the screen is rotated
Display volume panel on the left side of the screen
Short click Volume Down and Power to take partial screenshot
Button backlight brightness will adjust based on current screen brightness level
Button backlight will only appear when buttons are pressed rather than on all the time. Timeout still impacts this feature.
Enable on-screen navigation bar and disable hardware buttons
Swap the order of recents and back buttons
Show visualizer bars while playing music
Sync color with lock screen background
Use a smooth lava lamp style color blend animation
Time out feature may require a SystemUI restart.
Peeking notifications will show for %d seconds
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for 1 minute
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for %d minutes
Show app volume in volume panel
Display notification when changing alert slider position
Useful if the device actually has rounded corners
They really cut corners with this one
Use default status bar height while hiding cutout
Disable black fill-in for display cutout
Show notifications ticker-style in status bar
Ticker is visible only when notification heads-up is not shown. Devices with center notch should hide cutout under Cutout options.
Block system wakelocks to save battery
Blocking wakelocks has the potential to cause instability, crashes or data loss.
To see and block wakelocks, turn on wakelock blocker.
Block alarms while the screen is off to save battery
Blocking alarms have the potential to cause instability, crashes or data loss.
To see and block alarms, turn on alarm blocker.
When entirely silent (no ringer or vibrator)
Whether to flash when in Do Not Disturb mode
Show lyrics in status bar (requires app support and a SystemUI restart)
Set media artwork as the notification media background
Replace clear all notification text with floating button
Double-tap on the top third or bottom shortcut area of the lock screen to put the device to sleep
Double-tap status bar to put the device to sleep
Double tap power button (slower single tap response), Disables double power tap for camera.
Jump to camera gesture is now disabled
Disable power menu on lock screen
This will only disable the power menu on secure lock screens
Display the app\'s icon corresponding with the toast

Display the cross sign next to signal bar when data is disabled
Display a warning at bottom of QS panel when network is monitored by external apps or vpn

How often to make icons shift
Display the number of pending notifications
Disable Night Light when showing UDFPS
Disable Night Light on lock screen if UDFPS is active. Disabling this option might affect your fingerprint accuracy with Night Light on.

Show separate indicator when an any app uses location

Extra features for immersive gaming experience

Drag selection on the area you want to take as a screenshot
Spoof your device as Pixel XL for Google Photos app only to provide unlimited storage for backup
Spoof your device as a different model for specific games to unlock higher FPS
Spoof your device as Pixel 6 Pro to unlock higher quality streams on Amazon Prime, Disney+, Hotstar, and Netflix
Applications that should be hidden from launcher
Touch status bar to toggle visibility
Replace clear all notification text with material style floating button
This allows you to downgrade applications. Note that this may lead to crashes and data corruption.

This removes the screenshots and screenrecords limits for all applications. Normally, special applications are replaced with black areas in records. This can be convenient in some cases but may lead to privacy leaks. After changing this toggle, you may need to restart applications for the change to take effect.
Enable to display logo in the status bar
Choose which side to display the logo on, left or right
Replace heads-up notification with slim and less invasive version of redesigned ticker
Replace reTicker background color using notification app main color
Each battery level drop is color coded (requires SystemUI restart)
